info.title: Polaris PSA
info.description: Polaris PSA is a self-driving professional services automation solution that uses advanced technology to analyze real-time data, and then delivers recommendations to help keep projects, resources, and finances on track. The connector allows you to continuously sync projects, tasks, and resource assignments from Project Online to Polaris and time data from Polaris to Project Online.
